entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 after midnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the morning. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
